forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 64F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 64F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
